task.title: Replacing the Generator
task.shortdesc: Ensure proper gear mesh and alignment when installing the generator.

prereq.note: The generator drive pinion must properly mesh with the time gear to prevent noise and misalignment.

step.cmd: Position the generator bracket on the crankcase gasket.
step.info: The bracket should rest tightly and align with the time gear case face.

step.cmd: Adjust the mesh between the generator driving pinion and time gear.
step.info: Use paper gaskets between the bracket and cylinder block to regulate the mesh.

info.note:
Overly tight mesh will cause:
Humming noise
Generator shaft misalignment

taskbody.result: The generator will be properly installed with correct gear mesh and alignment.
